  • Method Details

    • toSI

      public static double toSI(byte unit, double value)
      It returns the value from a unit to SI unit
      Parameters:
      unit - The value from this unit to SI unit
      value - Value that is to be converted to SI Unit
      Returns:
      Converted value

    • fromSI

      public static double fromSI(byte unit, double value)
      It returns the value from SI to a given unit
      Parameters:
      unit - The value to this unit from SI unit
      value - Value that is to be converted from SI Unit
      Returns:
      Converted value

    • convert

      public static double convert(byte from, byte to, double data)
      It returns the value from a given unit to another given unit
      Parameters:
      from - from this unit
      to - to this unit
      data - value that is to be converted
      Returns:
      Converted value
